title: 【東華e學苑】佈景主題可依個人喜好進行調整(The theme can be adjusted according to personal preferences.)
author: 王立凡
content:
分類： 行政公告
來源： 教學卓越中心 - 王立凡 - lfwang@gms.ndhu.edu.tw - 電話8906422
對象： 全校教職員_全校學生
標題： 【東華e學苑】佈景主題可依個人喜好進行調整(The theme can be adjusted according to personal preferences.)
日期： Thu, 30 May 2024 15:33:11 +0800

親愛的教職員生

新版東華e學苑可依照自己的喜好調整佈景主題，可以在登入後從右上角點選姓名->偏好->編修個人資料->偏愛的佈景，進行選擇。
目前有Boost及Classic可供選擇，預設則是依網站設定為主。

(如課程有強制佈景主題，則依課程設定為主。)

教學卓越中心
課程與科技組王立凡助理敬上

Dear students, faculty, and staff,

The new version of Donghwa e-Learning allows you to adjust the theme according to your preferences. After logging in, you can select your name in the upper right corner -> Preferences -> Edit profile -> Preferred Theme to make your selection. Currently, Boost and Classic are available for selection, and the default is based on the website settings.

(If a course has a mandatory theme, it will be based on the course settings.)

Regards,
CTE
